bibl.bibl: Walsh, Benjamin Dann. 1863a. Observations on certain N.A. Neuroptera, by H. Hagen, M.D., of Kœnigsberg, Prussia; translated from the original French MS., and published by permission of the author, with notes and descriptions of about twenty new N.A. Pseudoneuroptera species. Proceedings of the Entomological Society of Philadelphia 2: 167–272.
